But I doubt the way that post worked would denig any of yours would 
it. I made BM out to be basically a state secret everyone knows about, 
but makes a point of not mentioning (or rather it's considered a 
historical side note). And that would basically be writting a book 
which would be fine except I'm already writting a 3 part series (if I 
can get it published) I call "Gundam Omega". It takes place in the 
year Martian Century 80. It involves the war between the Martian group 
"Red Sphere" and the now militaristic "Earth Sphere United Nations".
